title: Assign Driver to a New Load
description: A dispatcher needs to assign a newly available load to the most suitable driver based on location, hours of service (HOS), and equipment type.

tasks.description: Review the details of a new load, including origin, destination, and required equipment (e.g., refrigerated trailer).
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher understands the requirements of the load.

tasks.description: Find available drivers who are near the load's origin, have sufficient available HOS, and have the correct equipment qualification.
tasks.expected_outcome: System returns a list of 3 eligible drivers.

tasks.description: Assign the load to the best-fit driver and send them the dispatch information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The load is assigned, and the driver receives all necessary pickup details.
